item.description:
Friday Nite Dance Party at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles and Dance The Night Away –Meet Someone Special And Party With Central CT Singles

“Singles Dances provide the opportunity to meet many local singles all in one place-
So if you dance, don't dance, or just want to party with other local singles and meet someone special,
and check out the next Central CT Singles Dance Party”

Join Us For:


* Specialty Pizza
* Pasta
* Salad
* Rolls

* DJ Dance Music and Requests *

Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility
1250 Burnside Ave
East Hartford, CT 06108
I-84 to Exit 60 (near the Manchester line - next to Wickham Park)

The Party starts at 8 pm

Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

SAVE MONEY - Tickets are only $15
ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $20 only at http://www.CentralCTS...

Group Special - Half Price Tickets For Groups Of 10 or More
(only $ 7.50 per ticket) and Reserved Table(s) for your Group

A limited number of VIP Tickets are available for $15!

You will be seated at the VIP Table and enjoy FREE champagne plus other benefits and prizes. Get your VIP ticket online before Thursday, and then email your name and receipt number to VIP@CentralCTSingles.com

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF SPACE AVAILABLE, SO RESERVE YOUR SEAT TODAY!


Check Out Our Ads In The Hartford Courant And The Hartford Advocate

Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com for more info or call (860) 236-3343

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Friday Nite Dance Party at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant East Hartford
